Articles.Content:
KSP Version:
1.1.0.1230, Manjaro Linux 64-bit

What Happens:
If you open a right click menu for a part from a symmetry group, then pin it, an attempt to open a menu for other parts of the same symmetry group would result in inability to close any opened right click menus and inability to open new ones. 

Mods / Add-Ons:
Stock

Steps to Replicate:
General:
* During flight
* Right click a part to open it's menu
* Pin the menu
* Right click any part from the same symmetry group as the first clicked part without holding the mod key. Apparently nothing happens.

Example with a simple craft (command pod and 2 goo canisters)
craft: http://pastebin.com/mZy4aVB6
* Right click a goo canister
* Pin the opened menu
* Right click the other canister without holding the mod key. Apparently nothing happens.

Result:
* Right clicking any parts wouldn't open any menus for them
* Already open menus can't be closed either (even after unpinning, as if they remain pinned forever)

Fixes/Workarounds:
Not known yet

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:
In the last step, where apparently nothing happens a NullReferenceException is thrown, which can be seen in the following screenshot:
http://i.imgur.com/0jwaXbC.png

This bug was mentioned
here (2nd): http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/137786-heap-of-bugs/#comment-2531858
and here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/137402-11-windows-stuck-and-cant-right-click/#comment-2523858
